about_the_game:
Take control of dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures and explore a beautifully crafted world filled with threats and secrets. Build a pack/herd with your friends and take on the challenges of the land. Fight other players for survival and sustenance, conquer territories and nurture your offspring to adulthood. Always be on the lookout since danger not only comes from other players and the environment but sources beyond your comprehension...

The Lands of AldianImmerse yourself in an ancient world, lost in the shuffle of evolution, populated with creatures that promulgate intrigue. Explore different biomes, find hidden secrets and maybe you might stumble upon things that might bewilder you. 

The Denizens of Aldian

Players can select from a large roster of prehistoric creatures that includes dinosaurs, synapsids, temnospondyls and pterosaurs. Each creature has its own playstyle and niche in the environment and can be customized with skins and colors that players prefer. Not all creatures will be available from the beginning though and players will have to figure out how to unlock them.

The Challenges of Aldian

The lands are yours for the taking. Build a mighty pack/herd with your friends and challenge other packs for dominance. Endure natural disasters and threats that linger in the night for survival. Become an alpha and lead your pack/herd to conquer territories and challenge boss creatures. 

The Enigma of Aldian

Aldian of Ancients is not just a game about dinosaurs and survival. It is a game filled with secrets and mysteries. Players can explore the map freely and uncover things that will fill them with intrigue. However, secrets are not easily found but the rewards will be well worth it.

name: Aldian of Ancients

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.0GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: This game needs a dedicated graphics card to run. Also, with these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System or later
  • Processor: Octa-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.0GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3080 or AMD RX 6800 XT or higher with 8GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: Aldian of Ancients is a dinosaur survival/simulation multiplayer game set in a prehistoric world. Fight for survival, explore to find the wonders the land hides and craft your own stories.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Korean
